testproblem.name: Testing of particle attribute parameters in serial

import numpy as np from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("particle_attributes.particles.Thomas") attributes_error_1 = np.zeros((1,60))
for i in range(60): name = 'Thomas_' + str(i+1).zfill(2) attributes_error_1[0,i] = s[name]['Chem1'][0][-1] - 5.0 print "max error",abs(attributes_error_1).max()

import numpy as np from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("particle_attributes.particles.Thomas") attributes_error_2 = np.zeros((1,60))
for i in range(60): name = 'Thomas_' + str(i+1).zfill(2) OldTemp = 2.0 - abs(0.5-s[name]['position'][0][-2]) - abs(0.5-s[name]['position'][1][-2]) - np.sin(s['ElapsedTime']['value'][-2]*np.pi/2.0)/2.0 attributes_error_2[0,i] = s[name]['Chem2'][0][-1] - OldTemp print "max error",abs(attributes_error_2).max()

from fluidity_tools import stat_parser import numpy as np
s = stat_parser('particle_attributes.particles.Chris') attributes_error_4 = np.zeros((1,100)) X = np.fromfile('Xvals.txt',sep=' ') Y = np.fromfile('Yvals.txt',sep=' ') sq_error=0
for i in range(100): name = 'Chris_' + str(i+1).zfill(3) Temp = 2.0 - abs(0.5-s[name]['position'][0][-1]) - abs(0.5-s[name]['position'][1][-1]) - np.sin(s['ElapsedTime']['value'][-1]*np.pi/2.0)/2.0 Salinity = 2.0 - s[name]['position'][1][-1] attributes_error_4[0,i] = s[name]['Chem4'][0][-1] - (s[name]['position'][0][-1] + s['ElapsedTime']['value'][-1] + Salinity + Temp) sq_error = sq_error + attributes_error_4[0,i]**2
sq_error_4 = sq_error
